pages.text: The ludicrous Curse Poppet will protect its owner from $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$(). The $(l:bewitchment:poppets/poppet_practice)Poppet$() does so by absorbing the $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() like a sponge. $(br2)Once the $(l:bewitchment:poppets/poppet_practice)Poppet$() has successfully absorbed a $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$(), it can be rebound and used to apply its absorbed $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() to the target.
